--------------------
Text: Michael Jackson: 30th Anniversary Celebration:  In late November 2001, the CBS television network aired the concerts as a two-hour special in honor of Michael Jackson's thirtieth year as a solo entertainer (his first solo single, "Got to Be There", was recorded in 1971).

Text: Michael Jackson: 30th Anniversary Celebration:  The shows sold out in five hours.

Text: Michael Jackson: 30th Anniversary Celebration:  Ticket prices were pop's most expensive ever; the best seats cost $10,000 and included a dinner with Michael Jackson and a signed poster.

Text: Michael Jackson: 30th Anniversary Celebration:  The show was presented by David Gest, World Events LLC and Clear Channel Entertainment in conjunction with American Airlines, American Eagle and Amazon.com.
